name: Under the bed
description:
Under the Bed is a spine-chilling horror game that will take you on a nightmarish journey into the depths of fear. Assume the role of a young girl, desperately trying to sleep while a malevolent monster lurks beneath her bed or within the confines of her room, relentlessly pursuing her with the intent to kill. Brace yourself for a heart-pounding experience as you navigate a haunting atmosphere and confront your worst nightmares.

As darkness envelops the room, the girl finds herself trapped in a nightmarish cycle, oscillating between the realm of sleep and the eerie reality of her room. When she drifts into the world of dreams, she must unravel the truth behind the terrifying presence haunting her nights while evading the pursuit of monstrous creatures that lurk in the shadows.

Prepare for a harrowing adventure as you navigate a series of atmospheric levels, each filled with hair-raising encounters and heart-stopping moments. Use your wits and resourcefulness to solve puzzles, gather clues, and unlock the secrets hidden within the twisted corners of your subconscious. Every step forward brings you closer to the truth, but it also heightens the danger and intensifies the pursuit.

Dare to enter the realm of Under the Bed, where darkness dwells and the line between dreams and reality blurs. Will you survive the night and discover the truth that lies beneath the bed?
